title.narrative: Tax Administration and Statistical System Modernization Project

description.narrative: To improve effectiveness of tax collection and the national statistical system.

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

condition.narrative: Schedule 2 of the Financing Agreement. Section 1. Part A.2. Notwithstanding the provisions of Section I.A.1 immediately above, theRecipient shall cause the Project Implementing Entities to hire, not later than three (3) months from Effective Date, adisbursementspecialist, a procurement specialist, an office manager/translator and a M&E specialist, all with terms of referenceand qualifications acceptable to the Association and as further described in the POM.Schedule 2 of the Financing Agreement.Section 1. Part A.4. The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementing Entities to, not later than sixty (60) days from theEffective Date, install or update, as needed, an accounting software capable to support the Association’s and the ProjectImplementing Entities’ reporting and accounting requirements; all of the above in accordance with terms of reference acceptable tothe Association.

title.narrative: Overall efficiency gain: reduction of time between completion of data collection and release of key statistical indicators to the public
Time required to comply with taxes - World Bank Doing Business Paying Taxes sub-indicator
Hours in traning on field audit techniques on average per auditor per year (disaggregated by gender)
Staff trained in strategic management, planning techniques, accountability system, quality assurance, quality control, and internalcontrol systems out of total management staff (disaggreg. by gender)
Net taxes assessed per field audit (thousand som)
Openness of official statistics: measures coverage and openness of data across 21 data categories, using the Open Data Inventory (ODIN)
e-Filing rate for payroll (PAYE) withholding tax
Gender disparity in staff count by gender at NSC: top level female managers at the oblast and rayon level
Payments required – WB Doing Business Paying Taxes indicator (Payments)
Net taxes assessed per desk audit (thousand som )
Taxpayers reporting that the experience of taxpayer services: i) STS website; ii) STS call center, has improved

baseline.value: 38.3% taxpayers report to be fully satisfied with the STS website. 24.8% taxpayers consider the quality of consultations providedby the call center to be of high quality.

actual.value: 38.3% taxpayers report to be fully satisfied with the STS website. 24.8% taxpayers consider the quality of consultations providedby the call center to be of high quality.

title.narrative: On-time filing rate for payroll (PAYE) withholding tax
On-time filing rate for Value Added Tax (VAT)
Digitization of surveys using CAPI, CATI, CAWI - reduction of paper-based questionnaires and surveys

target.value: At least 75% of surveys are digitized.

title.narrative: University level curricula in local universities, including courses in Official Statistics, and Data Science

baseline.value: No courses exist in local universities in Official Statistics

target.value: At least one University level course in Official Statistics

actual.value: 1 course on "statistics" is the curricula of economic specialties

title.narrative: Decrees issued by the Government to enforce legal and regulatory reforms on statistics

baseline.value: No decrees issued on official statistics

target.value: At least 15 decrees issued by the Government

title.narrative: Risk based VAT refund claims automation

baseline.value: No risk based verification procedures for VAT refund claims

target.value: Risk based verification procedures for VAT refund claims developed and used

actual.value: No risk based verification procedures for VAT refund claims

title.narrative: Taxpayer segment-focused measures in the STS Annual Business Plan and Plan of Measures to Increase State Tax Revenue

baseline.value: STS Annual Business Plan and Plan of Measures to Increase State Tax Revenue do not currently have measures by taxpayer segment

target.value: STS Annual Business Plan and Plan of Measures to Increase State Tax Revenue have measures identified by taxpayer segment

actual.value: STS Annual Business Plan and Plan of Measures to Increase State Tax Revenue do not currently have measures by taxpayer segment

title.narrative: Improved process for compliance risk management

baseline.value: STS does not have a Compliance Risk Management Board

target.value: Compliance Risk Management Board or equivalent established and operational within the STS

actual.value: STS does not have a Compliance Risk Management Board

title.narrative: Improved case management process for enforcement and tax collections

baseline.value: The automated case management system is not in place.

target.value: The case management system is in place and the majority of routine enforcement activities are conducted using this system.

actual.value: The automated case management system is not in place.

title.narrative: Gender disparity in new staff hired during the project at NSC

target.value: The newly recruited staff maintain a less than 15% disparity by gender

title.narrative: Time required to respond to citizen requests received through the NSC website
Taxpayers reporting satisfaction with their interaction with the tax administration

baseline.value: 36% of taxpayers report full satisfaction with personal interaction with the STS.

actual.value: 36% of taxpayers report full satisfaction with personal interaction with the STS.
